page.title: 16CONSERVATION
page.content: This area is undergoing change caused by urban expansion moving across to the more rural county boundary crossing a region bearing industrial and historical sites from the coal and canal era and derelict buildings from more recent modernisation of the electricity supply system. {Conservationists}are making concerted efforts to prevent the area from becoming a wasteland by preserving wild life and ecology,keeping open footpaths and preserving interesting sites. {The Wyken Slough}Pool area is now a recreation area and has a conservation group working to encourage and protect the wild life around it while opening it to the public.
